title: Irving
author: Unknown
pages:
Irving is a very large
but morally shitty oil
company that basically
owns New Brunswick.

Founded in 1882 by
J.D. Irving, the
company grew into the
monopoly it is today.
Known for their
clearcutting, lumber
and paper division.

They are currently
based in Saint John.

Due to their level of
power in the province
they are able to
acquire whatever bit
of land they want
basically.

At least they give out


full sized sweets on
Halloween...
